plate_geometry_midsurface.png.description: 3D isometric view of a plate geometry showing midsurface, thickness t, and planar dimensions a and b with coordinate axes

plate_coordinate_system.png.description: 3D coordinate system showing plate with x, y, z axes and curved midsurface representation

membrane_bending_displacement_diagrams.p.description: Multiple diagrams showing membrane displacement and bending displacement in zx plane with coordinate systems and displacement vectors

plate_displacement_zy_plane.png.description: Plate displacement diagrams showing coordinate system and displacement components in zy plane with rotation angles

displacement_behavior_comparison.png.description: Three small diagrams showing displacement behavior u(x,y,z) for thin plate, sandwich, and thick composite plate

stress_distribution_cross_section.png.description: Cross-sectional stress diagram showing internal stress distribution along plate thickness with coordinate system and stress components

internal_forces_moments_plate_element.pn.description: 3D diagrams showing internal forces and moments per unit length on plate element including Mxx, Myy, Mxy, Nxx, Nyy, Nxy, Qx, Qy components

plate_boundary_conditions.png.description: Plate diagram showing boundary regions with applied forces TF and fixed boundary T0, illustrating boundary conditions

differential_element_membrane_forces.png.description: Differential plate element showing membrane forces Nxx, Nyy, Nxy and their increments with coordinate system and dimensions dx, dy

boundary_condition_examples.png.description: Two small diagrams showing boundary condition examples with displacement components U0x and U0y specified on different edges

rectangular_plate_geometry.png.description: Rectangular plate diagram showing coordinate system with dimensions a and b, and normal vectors to edges

applied_loads_rectangular_plate.png.description: Multiple diagrams showing applied membrane loads and bending/shear loads on rectangular plate with force and moment vectors

boundary_condition_examples_detailed.png.description: Multiple boundary condition examples showing mixed, fully simply-supported, and clamped edge conditions for rectangular plates

kirchhoff_plate_reference_system.png.description: 3D plate diagram showing reference surface, coordinate system x1-x2-x3, dimensions a and b, with bending displacement illustration

plate_generic_shape_reference_system.png.description: Plate with generic shape showing reference system Sn with tangent and normal vectors at point P on boundary

rectangular_plate_loads_boundary.png.description: Rectangular plate diagrams showing applied loads (moments Mx, My) and natural boundary conditions (moments and forces on edges)

plate_sinusoidal_pressure_load.png.description: Rectangular plate with simply-supported boundary and sinusoidal pressure load distribution

plate_exact_solution_setup.png.description: 3D rectangular plate with dimensions a and b showing sinusoidal pressure distribution and coordinate system
